item.title: Taking Firecracker for a spin
item.description: Firecracker1 is recently making rounds on the internet as this relatively new, awesome technology for running lightweight VMs. As something coming from AWS and powering AWS Lambda, my original perception was that it’s not easy to set or use. However, this write from Julia Evans2 shows that my perception is wrong. So, as I have recently picked up a used Dell R720 with decent amount of RAM and CPUs, it was time to take these two together for a spin.
